divs: sighting detailsi was watching tv and noticed this red object hovering to my left (sw). i live 30 yards from the cliff of the pacific ocean at the southern most tip of san pedro 1\2 mile east of point fermin san pedro. i have lived here for 9 years and know the difference between a helicopter & aircraft and know the colors of the lights. this object appeared to glow a bright red\orange color and did not travel in a straight line. it descended eventually into the ocean between point fermin park and catalina island. i thought it was a plane at first but the bright red color changed my mind immed. it never followed a straight line, i thought it might be a flare but it was stationary for a time then moved to the right then left etc. i knew that this was not any aircraft or helicopter for sure. i went to get my camera but it was not there when i returned :-(
